segments.text: I need a suggestion for a restaurant here in Manhattan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly ! How much are you planning to spend on dinner , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My date's very sophisticated , so I'm sure she would expect nothing but the best .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I suggest our own hotel restaurant ? It got three stars in the latest restaurant review .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , thank you , I want to go out on the town . What other ideas do you have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There's always Gramercy Tavern . They have live jazz . The food is delicious , but very expensive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds like a good place to take a date . Can you make a reservation for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As you wish , sir . You'll have a wonderful time there .
segments.speaker: S2
